snippet: In the burgeoning business of street markets, expertise often comes with on-the-job training while juggling costs and business strategy.
lead_paragraph: In the burgeoning business of street markets, expertise often comes with on-the-job training while juggling costs and business strategy.

headline.main: At Antiques Markets, Sellers With Know-How and Numbers Come Out on Top
headline.print_headline: At Antiques Markets, Know-How and Numbers Win the Prize
headline.content_kicker: The Art of Collecting: Biennale des Antiquaires
